title: Practical MongoDB Aggregations
description: The official guide to developing optimal aggregation pipelines with MongoDB 7.0

reviews.text: I loved this book. It was the perfect way to get started with the powerful aggregation framework.
My favorite book about MongoDB, hands down. It helped me understand the basics of aggregation.
Great resource for learning MongoDB and aggregation. I highly recommend it.
I really enjoyed this books. I am not one for reading physical books, but the information is definitely worth it.
Great resource for anyone looking to get into really taking advantage of the aggregation framework. It is practically its own language.

title: MongoDB: The Definitive Guide: Powerful and Scalable Data Storage

reviews.text: This book was pretty good.
I loved this book. It was the perfect way to get started with MongoDB and understand the basics of MQL and the MongoDB architecture.
My favorite book about MongoDB, hands down. It helped me understand the basics of MongoDB and MQL.
Great resource for learning MongoDB. I highly recommend it.

title: Mastering MongoDB 7.0
description: Explore the full potential of MongoDB 7.0 with this comprehensive guide. Mastering MongoDB 7.0 offers powerful techniques for efficient data manipulation, application integration, and security. This intermediate-to-master level book helps individuals utilize the latest version of MongoDB to achieve its full potential.

reviews.text: I loved this book. It was the perfect way to get started with MongoDB and understand the basics of MQL and the MongoDB architecture.
My favorite book about MongoDB, hands down. It helped me understand the basics of MongoDB and MQL.
